Console client — to receive weather from server¶

More info to appear here…

warning: unhandled cursor CursorKind.INCLUSION_DIRECTIVE stdio.h

void show_weather(char *buffer)¶

show_weather() - shows temprature, humidity and description of weather. @buffer: buffer that contain requested JSON file.

Extracts temrature, huidity and description arguments from requested JSON file and checks if this data is what we need.

The longer description may have multiple paragraphs.

Return: Does not have return.
